Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Amulet
Description: Amulet with two differently treated surfaces: one flat and the other in light relief. Depicted inside a rectangle with rounded corners is the head of a cow wearing a wig which is mounted with two volutes (or horns ?) encircling a solar disc. At the top of this design there is a suspension ring of multiple disc-shaped beads joined together.
